name: node-mongo-basic
description: Basic Node REST API with Express

scripts.import: mongoimport -u myDeveloper -p pass --authenticationDatabase=node-mongo-basic-dev --db node-mongo-basic-dev --collection user --drop --type json --file ./dataset/user_dataset.json --jsonArray && mongoimport -u myDeveloper -p pass --authenticationDatabase=node-mongo-basic-dev --db node-mongo-basic-dev --collection car --drop --type json --file ./dataset/car_dataset.json --jsonArray
scripts.predev: npm run -s dataset && npm run -s import
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DB_NAME=node-mongo-basic-dev DB_USER=myDeveloper DB_PASS=pass DB_AUTHENTICATION=node-mongo-basic-dev nodemon ./app.js
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test DB_NAME=test DB_USER=myTester DB_PASS=pass DB_AUTHENTICATION=test mocha --reporter list

author: Rafael Castillo Alcaraz <rafaelcastilloalcaraz@gmail.com>
